paper_metadata.title: Effect of zinc supplementation on growth and morbidity of Bangladeshi infants aged 4-24 weeks

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: We assessed the effect of zinc supplementation on growth and morbidity in poor Bangladeshi infants aged 4-24 wk
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Infants from Dhaka slums were enrolled at 4 wk of age and randomly assigned to receive 5 mg elemental Zn/d (n = 152) or placebo (n = 149) until 24 wk of age

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: This study evaluates the effect of zinc supplementation on growth and morbidity in poor Bangladeshi infants aged 4-24 wk
evidence_citations.country_citation: Infants from Dhaka slums were enrolled at 4 wk of age
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: We assessed the effect of zinc supplementation on growth and morbidity in poor Bangladeshi infants aged 4-24 wk
